name: Crazy Little Thing
description:
This thing
I just can't handle it
I must get right to it

A little experiment in making a twine that looks like a chat window that doubles as a love letter to my favourite band, Queen.

Please note - this is still very much in development and contains broken links :^)

Created by: Chride Lassheikki for Pride Game Jam HKI 2020

Code inspired by:
https://codepen.io/Founts/pen/gmhcl

https://www.w3schools.com/howto/howto_css_chat.asp
